# Type alias: IPanePrimitive\<HorzScaleItem\>

> **IPanePrimitive**\<`HorzScaleItem`\>:
> [`IPanePrimitiveBase`](../interfaces/IPanePrimitiveBase.html)
> \<[`PaneAttachedParameter`](../interfaces/PaneAttachedParameter.html)\<`HorzScaleItem`\>\>

Interface for pane primitives. It must be implemented to add some
external graphics to a pane.

## Type parameters[​](IPanePrimitive.html#type-parameters "Direct link to Type parameters"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Type parameters"} {#type-parameters .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

• **HorzScaleItem** = [`Time`](Time.html)
